description:
A Fresh Way to Do Statistics

JASP is a cross-platform software that allows you to conduct statistical analyses in seconds, and without having to learn programming or risking a programming mistake. It aims to be a complete statistical package for both Bayesian and Frequentist statistical methods, that is easy to use and familiar to users of SPSS.
Fixes
- Add the R functions strftime and strptime to the whitelist (https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-issues/issues/3768 https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-desktop/pull/6041)
- Some fixes for labels (https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-issues/issues/3715 https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-desktop/pull/6042)
- Initialization of row component fails sometimes (https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-desktop/pull/6043)
- bugfix: fix table cell vertical-align table export styles (https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-issues/issues/3008, https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-issues/issues/3620, https://github.com/jasp-stats/jasp-desktop/pull/5994)
